statements: SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE item_type = 'Electronics';
SELECT item_name, item_type, price FROM inventory ORDER BY item_type DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_type, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory ORDER BY price ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE item_type = 'Electronics';
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 5 AND price < 100 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE item_type IN ('Clothing','Accessories') AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%shoes%' ORDER BY quantity ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM seeds;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM tools ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT tool_name, category, price FROM tools WHERE category = 'Gardening Tools';
SELECT tool_id, tool_name, quantity FROM tools WHERE quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM seeds WHERE seed_id = 1;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY seed_name ASC;
SELECT tool_name, category, price FROM tools WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT seed_name, quantity, price FROM seeds WHERE quantity > 50 AND price < 30.00;
SELECT tool_name, category, price FROM tools WHERE category = 'Gardening' OR price > 100.00 ORDER BY tool_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Seeds;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM Seeds WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM Seeds WHERE seed_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM Seeds ORDER BY seed_name ASC;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM Seeds ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM Seeds WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY seed_name DESC;
SELECT tool_name, quantity FROM Tools WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM Seeds WHERE seed_name LIKE '%tomato%' AND quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT fertilizer_name, quantity FROM Fertilizers WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM Seeds WHERE seed_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM seeds;
SELECT name, quantity FROM fertilizers;
SELECT id, name, purpose FROM tools ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE item_location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY item_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM seeds WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE
SELECT name, quantity FROM tools ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_quantity > 10 AND item_location = 'Warehouse'
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM fertilizers WHERE toxicity_level = 'High'
SELECT * FROM seeds JOIN inventory ON seeds.id = inventory.item_id
SELECT * FROM Seeds;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM Seeds ORDER BY seed_name ASC;
SELECT seed_name, expiration_date FROM Seeds WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM Fertilizers WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT fertilizer_name, quantity FROM Fertilizers WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM Seeds;
SELECT * FROM Fertilizers WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT tool_name, price FROM Tools ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT s.seed_name, i.quantity FROM SeedInventory i JOIN Seeds s ON i.seed_id = s.seed_id WHERE i.location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT t.tool_name, i.quantity, t.price FROM ToolInventory i JOIN Tools t ON i.tool_id = t.tool_id WHERE i.quantity > 10 AND i.location = 'Tool Shed';
